ja498:9.4: Api te varaṃ attamano dadeyya → api nu te varaṃ attamano dadeyya (sya1ed, sya2ed) | api nu te attamano varaṃ dade (mr)
ja498:11.1: Āhaññantu → āhaññare (sya1ed, sya2ed) | āhaññaruṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed), bherimudiṅgasaṅkhe → ... saṅkhā (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja498:18.1: Sohaṃ evaṃ pajānāmi → so ahaṃ suppajānāmi (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja498:19.2: dvipadākaniṭṭhā → dipadā kaniṭṭhā (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | dvipadakaniṭṭhā (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja498:28.4: Adhammakāro tava → adhammakāro ca te (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
